text: no matter what your organization there's
a good chance you have data you need to
move maybe it's just a little or perhaps
a bit more than a little maybe you've
got data you need to bring in all at
once while other data trickles in over
time and still other data streams in
without pause if you want to optimize or
replace the Internet build hybrid clouds
connect applications directly into s3 or
capture constant streams from devices
AWS has a portfolio of data transfer
services that can work for you with
Direct Connect a dedicated physical
connection accelerates network transfers
between your data centers and ours
additionally the connection lets you
access both public and private IP based
services like s3 and ec2 and maintain
separation between environments AWS
snowball provides petabyte level data
transport via a secured appliance with
snowball you can ship petabytes without
high costs long transfer times or
security concerns with storage gateways
and on-premises data gateway links your
environment to the AWS cloud
infrastructure this lets you build a
hybrid cloud very easily where some
storage resides on prem with a seamless
and elastic cloud back-end amazon has
partnered with a wide array of industry
vendors to make it simple to bring
backups and archives into the cloud with
s3 connectors embedded in the leading
software packages you can backup right
into the cloud but maintain your backup
catalog and keep visibility and control
across jobs for streaming data Amazon
Kinesis firehose is the easiest and most
reliable option available firehose
captures device streams and delivers
them into s3 for consistent reliable and
non-stop use with business intelligence
analytics software and Internet of
Things applications firehose provides a
fully managed service that scales
automatically and requires no ongoing
administration firehose can also batch
compress and encrypt data before passing
it along s3 transfer acceleration helps
out with long distance transfers over
slow networks it provides all the
benefits of a traditional s3 put but at
an accelerated pace making for faster
transfers without any network
configuration or hardware accelerators
and if it isn't faster it's free at AWS
our customers have taught us how
critical challenging and unique
large-scale data transfers are which is
why we've created a fourth unit of
options to make importing and exporting
data easy safe and cost-effective visit
aws.amazon.com slash cloud data
migration to find out more and get
started today
